Outreach

At my time at Yale I have presented my science at Yale Open Labs and Flipped Science Fair events, open science outreach events which bring in middle and high school students in the New Haven area. These events have allowed me to develop my abilities to both visualize current astronomy research as well as construct an engaging narrative.
Credit: Kai Debus
Credit: Kai Debus
Below you can find a poster I designed for the Flipped Science Fair, which took place in October 2018, which outlines my current project in its simplest, most straightforward terms. Also available is a link to a talk I gave earlier that year in an Open Labs Science Cafe.
